properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Tuscaloosa, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 9 at 10:59AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Black Warrior River At Holt Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...Hale...
Marengo and Tuscaloosa Counties.
Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...
Hale...Marengo...Sumter and Tuscaloosa Counties.

.A Flood Warning has been issued at Holt Lock and Dam and Oliver
Lock and Dam due to expected rainfall amounts between 4 and 6
inches through the day on Tuesday. Additional heavy rainfall is
possible through the end of this upcoming week which will cause
water levels to remain elevated or increase further. Interests
should closely monitor the latest river forecasts through the
upcoming week.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam.
* from Tuesday afternoon until further notice...or until the Warning
is cancelled.
* At 10:30 AM Sunday The stage Was 124.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 129 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early Tuesday afternoon and
continue to rise to near 137.7 feet by Wednesday evening.
* Impact...At 135.0 feet...Numerous camphouses and some permanent
residences southwest of Tuscaloosa become cutoff.
* Impact...At 140 feet...Flooding of portions of Jack Warner
Parkway can be expected. Some industrial property may also begin
to flood along Jack Warner Parkway. Residential flooding will
commence in areas southwest of Tuscaloosa at stages above 140
feet.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Monday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
